title: Are Eastern European nations the victims of Nazi and Soviet terror? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yep, most of Central and Eastern Europe was occupied by Nazi Germany and after that by the USSR +- until 1989. So, in some ways the WW2 ended for these nations in the late 80s/early 90s Thank God, It´s gone…

Very much so, in turns. Remember they were allies to start with and did split among them pretty much all the space and countries that layed in between. And not to welcome them and give them a better life :-)
